Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project involves strategic and planned burning of savanna areas in the high rainfall zone during the early dry season to reduce the risk of late dry season wild fires.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
3435



This project is in the Lachlan Shire Council area local government area.
Notes:
15/12/2014 Variation of project method - from Carbon Farming (Reduction of Greenhouse Gas Emissions through Early Dry Season Savanna Burning) Methodology Determination 2012 to Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reduction of Greenhouse Gas Emissions through Early Dry Season Savanna  Burning - 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013

11/9/2015 Variation of project method - from Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reduction of Greenhouse Gas Emissions through Early Dry Season 
Savanna Burning 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013 to Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015.

1/10/2015 Variation to participant name - from Indigenous Land and Sea Corporation to Indigenous Land and Sea Corporation and Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd.

05/05/2020 This project was contracted in Nov-15 and CAC102372 has now been completed.

08/11/2022 Variation to participant name - from Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd and Indigenous Land and Sea Corporation to Indigenous Land and Sea Corporation.
